channel.title: [317] Allowing certain characters to be said?
channel.description:
Hello, in my 317 client (like most others I've seen out there as well) whenever I type the "<" or">" key in the chat and press enter, it just comes up as a blank character.
I was just wondering if there was a certain way I could make an exception for those characters to be said? Thanks :)

item.title: [317] Allowing certain characters to be said?
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Hello, in my 317 client (like most others I’ve seen out there as well) whenever I type the “<” or">" key in the chat and press enter, it just comes up as a blank character.

I was just wondering if there was a certain way I could make an exception for those characters to be said?
Thanks
